But it\'s not related to any issue between the buyer and the shop \"seller\" is any Unfortunately, if there is any issues with the seller hope to be solved with the shop owner directly with his contact info that has been provided on his page. The GoBayan platform doen\'t have any relation with sell operation between the buyer and seller. GoBayan it\'s just a platform that gives space to Seller to display their Products and Buyers to browse what they looking for to buy.
